articles.title: 'Colonial mindset': India strongly condemns EU Parliament over Manipur resolution | TOI Original - Times of India
articles.description: India strongly condemned the European Parliament's adoption of a resolution regarding recent clashes in Manipur, asserting that such interference in India's internal affairs is unacceptable. The external affairs ministry spokesperson emphasised that
